Title: Enter the Void
Writer: Gaspar NoÃ©, Lucile Hadzihalilovic (with the help of)
Actors: Paz de la Huerta, Nathaniel Brown, Cyril Roy, Olly Alexander
Plot: A French drug dealer living in Tokyo is betrayed by his best friend and killed in a drug deal. His soul, observing the repercussions of his death, seeks resurrection.
